description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Enhanced train service during National Day and Mid-Autumn Festival Holidays
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 國慶假期及中秋節期間加強列車服務

2025-10-06T06:10:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that to facilitate passengers' travel, MTRCL will enhance train service on Mid-Autumn Festival holidays. 

Mid-Autumn Festival (6 October)
•Enhanced train service from 3pm: local lines (except the Airport Express and Disneyland Resort Line)
•Overnight train service: all local lines (except the Airport Express, Disneyland Resort Line and journeys to or from Lo Wu and Lok Ma Chau stations on the East Rail Line) and 7 Light Rail routes
•Extended MTR Bus service hours: routes 506, K51 and K54A

Mid-Autumn Festival holidays (7 to 8 October)
•More frequent train trips will be provided on the East Rail Line during different periods

Crowd management measures may be implemented at stations when necessary and please refer to the latest service updates. 

Please refer to MTR's website for details.
2025-10-06T06:10:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，為方便乘客出行，港鐵會於中秋節假期加強列車服務。

中秋節（10月6日）
•下午3時起加強服務：本地鐵路綫（機場快綫及迪士尼綫除外）
•通宵行駛：所有本地鐵路綫（機場快綫、迪士尼綫及東鐵綫來往羅湖及落馬洲站除外）及7條輕鐵路綫
•延長服務時間：港鐵巴士506、K51及K54A

中秋節假期（10月7至8日）
•東鐵綫於不同時段加密班次

部分車站在人多時或會實施客流管理措施，請留意最新車務資訊。

詳情請參閱港鐵網頁。

2025-10-06T21:30:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-10-06T21:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

2025-10-07T16:53:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-10-07T16:53:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。
